website_summaries.verdict: This cutting-edge keg is the future of home brew technology with automated brewing features to create your ideal beer.
pros: Brew up to 2.6 gallons of quality beer inspired by the world's most popular brews
Ingredients are 100% natural with no additives or preservatives
Wi-Fi capabilities and an LCD screen allow you to monitor and control your brew with push notifications
cons: Price is double a regular home brewing keg and going automatic has technological flaws when Wi-Fi is down

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival, little help from support
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged,the radiator fan was rolling around inside the case, I contacted support asking for specifications for a replacement fan. Support emailed me back about 5 days later stating they do not know the specs for the fan and would contact me when they have that information, it has been about 2 weeks since and have not heard anything. In the mean time I had to tape a Noctua to the outside of the unit for it to function.
customer_reviews.author: Oxytropis

customer_reviews.title: The Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this because I wanted to make beer but I wanted an easy way to do it. BeerDroid to the rescue. Absolutely amazing and so easy to use. The best thing is that you can manage your brew from anywhere with your app, and it'll update you and let you know if there are any problems. Also, if you have more than one person that wants to brew you can have multiple people logged into the app. If you want to brew easily, GET THIS! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ongleehinakan

customer_reviews.title: Should work - doesn't
customer_reviews.text: If you check facebook, you'll see that lots of folks have complained about the keg liners leaking. The connection looks like a simple screw, but it just doesn't fit. Customer support is basically a link to a video that doesn't help. Beerdroid is great, though. Plan on bottling or another keg system if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: teamshrink

customer_reviews.title: Cant get what you need on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a fermenter, so you are essentially placing dried wort in the droid. 1 star will remain until they make ingredients, accessories and supplies available on Amazon. Currently, the Brewart store is the only place to buy what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: wifi does not work
customer_reviews.text: The wifi won't work. Nor by wps or the manual config. Customer support takes just too long to give answers. What was an incredible gift for my 30rd birthday is just making a frustrating day for me. At this moment I won't recommend people to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nader

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve brewed 3 beers so far in this machine. It’s very user friendly and easy to use. Brewart has 101 videos, FAQs, and forums that answer basically every question you will have. If you don’t find an answer, their customer service is super knowledgeable and helpful. If you don’t believe me, just go look at the Facebook page or read entries on the forums. That’s what I did before making such a large purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Omg!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! Best gift I’ve ever given to my husband!!! Great quality, reputable company, great support group via website and Facebook groups!!!! Beet to 37 degrees. Perfectly cold!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dean

customer_reviews.title: Makes great beer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use makes great beer takes up very little space
customer_reviews.author: curtis s.

customer_reviews.title: Received the product but no kegs.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product but no kegs. System is useless without them. I am waiting for the manufacturer to reply.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hood Forest of Dean

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very good. The beer mixture was scattered everywhere, practically from one envelope half was spilled :(
customer_reviews.author: Tsvetomir

customer_reviews.title: Worst connectivity for the money no troubleshooting support
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if the stupid wifi would connect, worst set of instructions and troubleshooting for a device I paid a premium for
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Best auto brewer there is.
customer_reviews.text: There really isn’t one better. You can keep it simple and push a button or you customize and/or use your own ingredients. Want to start low temp and increase every day? You can do that from your cell phone while on vacation. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get supplies
customer_reviews.text: Bought the BeerDroid and made a batch of good beer with what comes with the unit. I placed a new order for different types of beer ingredients for new batches over two months ago, and BrewArt keeps making excuses as to why they can't deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Way better options available
customer_reviews.text: What a rich kid toy. 1.5 gallons is not much beer. Do it the proper way and at least make a partial mash on the stove and keg it in cornelius kegs. Buy a beer meister, convert a fridge, make a Keezer. You'll make more and better beer. Buy a Grainfather! This thing is not for the serious home Brewer.
customer_reviews.author: 1 spicychef

product_meta.title: BeerDroid Fully Automated Beer Brewing System with American Pale Ale BrewPrint
product_meta.description:
Style Name:BeerDroid

Brews 10 liters (2.6 gallons) of quality beer at the touch of a button. Full temperature control throughout the brewing process and a world-wide patented end of fermentation (EOF) technology, for premium results, every time. Brew any beer style at the touch of a button, then monitor and control using the BrewArt app. This item only runs on 110V electrical outlets.
feature_bullets: The BeerDroid is the world’s first fully automated personal brewer. You can brew 2.6 gallons of premium quality beer with the push of a button.

Included with your BeerDroid is the American Pale Ale BrewPrint. BrewPrints have been designed by BrewArt master brewers and are inspired by the world’s most popular beers. BrewArt ingredients are 100% natural and free from additives and preservatives.

The BeerDroid is Wi-Fi connected and with the BrewArt app you can monitor and control your brew, receive push notifications of brewing milestones, update your firmware and shop through the many available BrewPrints and accessories. Each BrewPrint has its own brewing profile which is automatically downloaded when starting a brew using the BrewArt app.
Features an easy to read LCD screen to check the status of your brew, control your temperature and customize your brew. Two piece snap tap and easy flush drain for minimal cleaning.
The BeerDroid features patented end-of-fermentation (EOF) technology that will automatically detect when your brew is complete and ready for kegging.
